ovdesc.p: This table is used to specify the module flow hierarchy for comparison purposes. The tables that need to be compared are specified here.

desc.p: Any ID with Alpha-Numeric values. Upto 35 characters are allowed.
The Name of the file or application that needs to be compared should be entered here. Eg STMT.ENTRY, ACCOUNT . Mandatory input. Upto 35 characters are allowed.
This is a no input field. The field COMP.RANK will be system defaulted and is used for establishing the hierarchy of the linkages.
Mandatory input. Text for description. Upto 35 characters are allowed.

The information that is to be compared , if it is required to be extracted from a linked file, then the details of the common field, through which the data can be linked needs to be specified in this field . Upto 35 characters are allowed.

Should be a valid routine name. An entry in the PGM.FILE with type 'S' is checked. If no link field exists, then a routine can be attached to this field to link the linked application with the main application. Upto 35 characters are allowed. Eg : GET.PL.KEYS.FOR.LINE

Should contain a value in MAIN.FILE.NAME before a value is entered in this field. The linked file name from where the information that needs to be extracted and compared is specified here. Linked applications will be compared only when the main applications throw up differences. Upto 35 characters are allowed.
